‚≠ê Canvas_ity Dashed Star Demo

About: This demo showcases the canvas_ity library compiled to WebAssembly with the new fixed dash API. Canvas_ity is a high-quality, single-header C++ library for 2D vector graphics rendering, closely modeled on the HTML5 Canvas specification.

Dashed Star Demo: This example demonstrates path building, fills, strokes, dashed line patterns, line joins, line caps, linear gradients, drop shadows, and compositing operations using the clean EMBIND API (no underscore prefixes) that properly handles JavaScript arrays.

Loading WASM module...

JavaScript Code Using WASM Library:

// This code runs in JavaScript calling the WASM canvas_ity library:

function renderStar() {
    // Create canvas using EMBIND clean API (no underscores)
    const canvasIty = new Module.CanvasIty(256, 256);
    
    // Build a star path
    canvasIty.begin_path();
    canvasIty.move_to(128.0, 28.0);   canvasIty.line_to(157.0, 87.0);
    canvasIty.line_to(223.0, 97.0);  canvasIty.line_to(175.0, 143.0);
    canvasIty.line_to(186.0, 208.0); canvasIty.line_to(128.0, 178.0);
    canvasIty.line_to(69.0, 208.0);  canvasIty.line_to(80.0, 143.0);
    canvasIty.line_to(32.0, 97.0);   canvasIty.line_to(98.0, 87.0);
    canvasIty.close_path();
    
    // Set up drop shadow
    canvasIty.set_shadow_blur(8.0);
    canvasIty.set_shadow_offset(0.0, 4.0);
    canvasIty.set_shadow_color(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.5);
    
    // Fill with yellow
    canvasIty.set_fill_color(1.0, 0.9, 0.2, 1.0);
    canvasIty.fill();
    
    // NEW: Set dashed stroke pattern - the fixed API!
    canvasIty.set_line_dash([21.0, 9.0, 1.0, 9.0, 7.0, 9.0, 1.0, 9.0]);
    canvasIty.set_line_dash_offset(10.0);
    canvasIty.set_line_width(6.0);
    canvasIty.set_stroke_color(0.9, 0.0, 0.5, 1.0);
    canvasIty.stroke();
    
    // Add linear gradient shine effect
    canvasIty.set_linear_gradient_fill(64.0, 0.0, 192.0, 256.0);
    canvasIty.add_color_stop_fill(0.30, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.0);
    canvasIty.add_color_stop_fill(0.35, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.8);
    canvasIty.add_color_stop_fill(0.45, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.8);
    canvasIty.add_color_stop_fill(0.50, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.0);
    
    canvasIty.set_global_composite_operation(1); // source_atop
    canvasIty.fill_rect(0.0, 0.0, 256.0, 256.0);
}
